attributes.action: appoint only elected MPs as ministers, which would make them directly accountable to their 'shadows' during debate in the House of Commons and to the Electorate. Giving individuals a seat in the House of Lords in order to appoint them as a Government minister must cease as it is totally undemocratic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that all Government ministers should be democratically elected MPs, not failed politicians who have served as EU commissioners, their spouses and those from Commerce and Industry who did not choose the House of Commons route.
